TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 510
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Elias R Wightman, 10-13-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Elias R. Wightman, October 13, 1830. instructions for surveying.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 510

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Elias R. Wightman, October 13, 1830. instructions for surveying. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr E. R. Weightman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir i wrote you two letters relative to *person_mentioned*J. E. Fisher*/person_mentioned* and *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Jaques*/person_mentioned*'s land*/location_mentioned* informing you that *person_mentioned*Mr. Ira Ingram*/person_mentioned* had led me into an error relative to *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Fisher*/person_mentioned*s tract*/location_mentioned*, or else I misunderstood him— *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Fisher*/person_mentioned*s is on the East side*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Jaques*/person_mentioned* on the West of Prairie Creek */location_mentioned**location_mentioned*next below *person_mentioned*Peyton*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*— I also sent you a letter from *person_mentioned*Nelson */person_mentioned*relative to his *location_mentioned*quarter*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*I wish you to come up, or send me all the returns of the surveys you have made I have only untill the *date_mentioned n="12-01-1830">first of Decr*/date_mentioned*,, to finish my affairs and start for *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-13-1830">Oct. 13. 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
